Description: View in Rome; a large rectangular building with smoke issuing from the chimneys, many arches in the walls below and at r, figures in the street, a rocky mound at left foreground Brush drawing in grey wash, over black chalk
Bibliographic references: Hind 1915-31 / Catalogue of Dutch and Flemish Drawings preserved in the Department of Prints and Drawings in the British Museum (16)
Exhibition history: 2004-2005 Oct-Jan, Birmingham, Barber Inst of Fine Arts, 'Bartolomeus Breenbergh 'Joseph in Egypt'
